page.title: 20A Day in the Life of Geraint
page.content: Mum shouts up the stairs at 7:35 but I take no notice, so by the time my mum gets me up it's 7:50. I go down the stairs, into the bathroom and have a brisk wash, I then dress into my school clothes and have a breakfast of Weetabix and oats. By the time I have eaten my breakfast it is 8:00. I then sit down and read a book. At 8:25 I brush my hair and teeth and I put my hand cream on because I suffer from eczema. At 8:35 I walk to school with my mum. It is 8:50 when I get to school so I play football in the school yard. We line up at 8:55 and start lessons at 9:00, there is a break at 10:30 which lasts 15 mins. I eat my lunch at 12:05 and I play on the yard until 1:10. School ends at 3:30 and I walk home. After I have my tea and I have had a bath I brush my teeth and go to bed.{Geraint J. Weber
